description: Join Mary-Kate and Ashley at their slumber party where there is plenty of singing and dancing to go around. These girls know how to have fun by adding songs to everything from pizza making to makeovers.
name: You're Invited to Mary-Kate & Ashley's Sleepover Party

original_info.id: You're Invited to Mary-Kate and Ashley's Favorite Parties_1998
original_info.name: You're Invited to Mary-Kate and Ashley's Favorite Parties

review.name: Good for little girls, for adults...eh
review.reviewBody: This show (can't call it a movie) was (if I'm right) the start of the series. This show wasn't bad for kids (mainly girls). It has songs and things girls kinda enjoy doing at sleepovers. The girls weren't bad at acting or singing. The issue I had was it made the boys out to be jerks then losers. Other than that, good kids (mostly girls) movie. Adults will likely roll their eyes to it, while girls will enjoy it.
